page.title: 06HEATHFIELD SCHOOL HEATHFIELD
page.content: {Heathfield School}was built in 1898.There are only{28 children}in two classes; an Infant class from 5_7 and a Junior class from 8_11.It is a{ {Church Aided}school and so the chairman of the governors is a vicar. All the children come from{Heathfield {village}and most walk to school.{21 {people}work at the school but 11 are governors.There are 3 teachers, 1 of which is a part time teacher,1 secretary,1 MTA,2 cleaners 1 of which cleans outside,1 patrol crossing and 1 cook.Two thirds of the children have school dinners and 1 third have pack lunches.The school starts at 9:15am. Break starts at 10:40am and ends at 10:55am.At 12:20pm they have dinner and go back to class for register at 1:25pm.Then they have another break at 2:30pm to 2:40pm and school ends at 3.50pm{Mr H.Kingsley}is the headmaster
